content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to search for cheap flight options to Norway on Skyscanner. The website offers customized flight options, tips for finding cheap flights, and hotel and car rental options. I also discovered that Skyscanner allows users to compare flights to other destinations.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://blisterreview.com/gear-reviews/trip-report-paddling-norway", "https://www.dnr.state.mn.us/state_parks/starter_kit/paddle.html", "https://www.dcr.virginia.gov/state-parks/lake-anna", "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/cycling/", "https://freewildsouls.com/destination/kayaking-naeroyfjord", "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/", "https://preikestolenbasecamp.com/plan-your-stay/our-history/?lang=en", "https://www.visitnorway.com/listings/kayaking-in-nordfjord-%7C-olden-active/211713/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
